lines.dialogue: Hey Meimei, How's it going?
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: I'm doing pretty good! How about you?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Um. I'm ok, it's just...
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: Whatâ€™s wrong!?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: The quiz...
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: That online quiz from our Calculus class?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Yeah. That quiz is just so hard. It takes me so much time during the weekend.
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: Oh, really? So how did you figure out the extra credit questions?
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: I was actually still working on those, but I had some ideas for what to try next.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Great! So would you like to share your idea with me?
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: Sure! Let's take a look together!
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Nice! Did the TA talk about the extra credit question during your discussion section?
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: No, not in our section. But I may have some ideas for those questions now.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Wow, how did you figure it out so fast?
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: So Chinese people are all good at math, right?
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: Hah, I like the way you solve that question. How about this next one?
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: Thanks. Just give me one second. I need to take a look at my notes.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Same! That question also bugged me. So do you have any ideas for the next one?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Yeah, but I'm not 100% sure...
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Oh, don't overthink it. It's just a compliment.
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: Um...never mind... let's move on to the next question.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Nice job, Meimei! From your notes, you're way better at math than me.
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: You were working hard yesterday! Thanks for sharing your problem-solving skills.
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue:
Thank you Meimei! So you guys must really have a talent for math. 
You must all have a great passion for it!
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue:
Guys, you have 20 minutes to prepare for the upcoming presentation. 
After finalizing your ideas, each team will get 5 minutes to talk.
lines.name: Professor

lines.dialogue: All right. Let's get started.
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: Sure! I got an idea about the topic for our presentation, which is ......
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: That's a good idea! Maybe we can also add something like......
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: Good point! Let's use your suggestion!
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Actually, I have another idea about this topic.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Based on what the professor just mentioned, maybe... um... we can think about this topic in this way....
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: ...Oh, I got your point. Do you mean something like this......?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue:
You only have 5 minutes remaining for your in-class presentation.
Make sure you guys are ready for what you are going to say.
lines.name: Professor

lines.dialogue: Meimei, your idea sounds really good. But I think your idea is kind of similar to Frank's.
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: We can just add it as an appendix when we finalize our presentation.
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: What do you think?
lines.name: Emily

lines.dialogue: Nice job, everyone. So we'll present what we just discussed. MeiMei, if there is a chance, we can talk about your idea next time.
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Thanks for clarifying your idea for us! I really appreciate it. We should consider your idea as part of our presentation.
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Oh, sorry, I didn't quite understand your idea earlier, but I believe it will be an excellent point to add to our presentation.
lines.name: Emily
